entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Morrisburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:35 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain early this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
